content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <metadata>  <idinfo>   <citation>    <citeinfo>     <origin>Iowa Department of Natural Resources</origin>     <pubdate>20110324</pubdate>     <title>Air emission points for facilities in Iowa with operating permits for Title V of the Federal Clean Air Act_considered MAJOR permits</title>     <geoform Sync="TRUE">vector digital data</geoform>     <onlink>ftp://ftp.igsb.uiowa.edu/gis_library/IA_State/Environmental_Regulation/air_emission_points_titlev.zip</onlink><ftname Sync="TRUE">ONE_STOP_FACILITIES_VW_AIR_EP</ftname><edition>20110708</edition></citeinfo>   </citation>   <descript>    <abstract>Air emission points for facilities in Iowa with operating permits for Title V of the Federal Clean Air Act, considered "major" permits.  Also includes emission points for a few facilities that are considered minor, but must have a Title V operating permit for part of their operation.  Includes some stack parameters.</abstract>    <purpose> This digital, geographically referenced data set was developed by the Iowa Department of Natural Resources to carry out agency responsibilities related to management, protection, and development of Iowa's natural resources. </purpose>    <langdata Sync="TRUE">en</langdata></descript>   <timeperd>    <timeinfo>     <sngdate>      <caldate>20110708</caldate>     </sngdate>    </timeinfo>    <current>ground condition</current>   </timeperd>   <status>    <progress>Complete</progress>    <update>Monthly</update>   </status>   <spdom>    <bounding>     <westbc Sync="TRUE">-98.450270</westbc>     <eastbc Sync="TRUE">-90.078409</eastbc>     <northbc Sync="TRUE">43.553626</northbc>     <southbc Sync="TRUE">0.409868</southbc>    </bounding>    <lboundng><leftbc Sync="TRUE">58784.000000</leftbc><rightbc Sync="TRUE">736136.000000</rightbc><bottombc Sync="TRUE">45412.000000</bottombc><topbc Sync="TRUE">4822297.000000</topbc></lboundng></spdom>   <keywords>    <theme>     <themekt>None</themekt>     <themekey>environment</themekey><themekey>Clean Air Act</themekey><themekey>Air quality permit</themekey><themekey>Title V</themekey><themekey>emission point</themekey></theme>   </keywords>   <accconst>None</accconst>   <useconst>The development of the coverages in the NRGIS Library represents a major investment of staff time and effort.
